mapper.insert: insert into review_check(rnum, writer, writeday, title, content, prdnum, re_writer, re_writeday, request) values(#{rnum}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{title}, #{content}, #{prdnum}, #{re_writer}, #{re_writeday}, 1)

insert into review_check(rnum, writer, writeday, title, content, prdnum, re_writer, re_writeday, request, dstatus) values(#{rnum}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{title}, #{content}, #{prdnum}, #{re_writer}, #{re_writeday}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update review_check set approval=1, dstatus=1 where rnum=#{rnum}
update review_check set reason=#{reason}, approval=1, dstatus=-1 where rnum=#{rnum}
